summary:
WHY ARE YOU BUYING CLOTHES AT THE SOUP STORE!?

This is a mod that replaces some of the draugr sounds with sound from the "I'm at soup" bit from Code Ment.
descriptionHtml:
WHY ARE YOU BUYING CLOTHES AT THE SOUP STORE!?

Just as the small description says, this is a mod that replaces some of the Draugr sounds with quotes from the "i'm at soup" bit from Code Ment.Â 

[size=4]but IS IT IMMERSIVE!?
[/size]Yes, if the Elder Scrolls lore involves Draugr screaming about soup and soup stores.

[size=5]THANKS FOR VIEWING/DOWNLOADING! CHECK BACK LATER FOR A MOD UPDATE!
[youtube]NlTH82Ei9xE[/youtube][/size]
